div.style: display: inline-block; background-color: #d9e0e7; padding: 6px; margin: 4px; border: 1px solid #8da1b4; border-radius: 5px; line-height: 60%

div.p: description: if child or person has not been vaccinated, give Hib vaccine between 6 weeks and 59 months

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Hib - No Doses
description: Provide Hib immunizations – using the "Hib Vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (1 dose scheme)

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient for Hib because no doses on 1 dose scheme
Should vaccinate patient for Hib because no doses on 1 dose scheme

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Hib - No Doses
description: Provide Hib immunizations – using the "Hib Vaccine immunization 3p schedule – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient for Hib because no doses on 3p dose scheme
Should vaccinate patient for Hib because no doses on 3p dose scheme
"In a country where the peak burden of severe Hib disease occurs in young infants" = TRUE
Should vaccinate patient for Hib because no doses on 3p dose scheme

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Hib - 1 Dose
description: Provide Hib immunizations – using the "Hib Vaccine immunization 3p schedule – 1 PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient for Hib because 1 dose on 3p dose scheme
Should vaccinate patient for Hib because 1 dose on 3p dose scheme
"In a country where the peak burden of severe Hib disease occurs in young infants" = TRUE
Should vaccinate patient for Hib because 1 dose on 3p dose scheme
Should vaccinate patient for Hib because 1 dose on 3p dose scheme

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Hib - 2 Doses
description: Provide Hib immunizations – using the "Hib Vaccine immunization 3p schedule – 2 PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient for Hib because 2 doses on 3p dose scheme
Should vaccinate patient for Hib because 2 doses on 3p dose scheme
"In a country where the peak burden of severe Hib disease occurs in young infants" = TRUE
Should vaccinate patient for Hib because 2 doses on 3p dose scheme

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Hib - No Doses
description: Provide Hib immunizations – using the "Hib Vaccine immunization 3p + 1 schedule – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (3p+1 dose scheme)

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient for Hib because No dose on 3p+1 dose scheme
Should vaccinate patient for Hib because No dose on 3p+1 dose scheme
"In a setting where the greatest disease morbidity and mortality occur later, or where rate reductions of disease are not fully sustained after the routine use of Hib vaccine" = TRUE
Should vaccinate patient for Hib because No dose on 3p+1 dose scheme
